com.microsoft.azure.management.sql

Class AuditingPolicyOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.sql.AuditingPolicyOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuditingPolicyOperations, ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>

    public class AuditingPolicyOperationsImpl
extends Object
implements ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, AuditingPolicyOperations
    Represents all the operations to manage Azure SQL Database and Database Server Audit policy. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve and Update audit policy.

    • Method Summary

      • createOrUpdateDatebasePolicyAsync

        public Future<OperationResponse> createOrUpdateDatebasePolicyAsync(String resourceGroupName,
                                                                   String serverName,
                                                                   String databaseName,
                                                                   DatabaseAuditingPolicyCreateOrUpdateParameters parameters)
        Creates or updates an Azure SQL Database auditing policy.
        Specified by:
        createOrUpdateDatebasePolicyAsync in interface AuditingPolicyOperations
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the Resource Group to which the server belongs.
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database is hosted.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the auditing policy applies.
        parameters - Required. The required parameters for createing or updating a Azure SQL Database auditing policy.
        Returns:
        A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.
